project.name: Simple Hello World ROS Subscriber Activity Example in Java
project.description: A Java-based activity that creates a ROS subscriber for a given ROS topic and logs messages received on that topic.

property.name: space.activity.ros.node.name
property.description: The ROS node name to be used for this activity.
